results.question: What is the CLI command to create a new Vue.js SPA with the official Vue project scaffolding tool (create-vue)?
When is it necessary to use .value?
results.correct_answer: When setting the value of a ref in the script section
incorrect_answers: When using v-if to conditionally render an element
When accessing the value of a ref in the template
When accessing the value of data declared with reactive()

results.question: What is the shorthand for v-bind?
Which of the following is not a valid lifecycle hook?
Which of the following best describes Nuxt?
results.correct_answer: A meta-framework that enhances Vue with various rendering modes, conveniences, and more
incorrect_answers: A library of common transition styles
A framework for building mobile apps
A library of re-usable UI elements
